document_text:
Information Security Policy

Purpose: This policy establishes guidelines for protecting organizational information assets.

1. ACCESS CONTROL
All users must authenticate using multi-factor authentication (MFA) when accessing sensitive systems. Passwords must be at least 12 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.

2. DATA CLASSIFICATION
Data is classified into three categories:
- Public: Information available to general public
- Internal: Information for internal use only
- Confidential: Sensitive information requiring special protection

3. INCIDENT RESPONSE
Security incidents must be reported within 24 hours to the security team. A formal incident response plan exists documenting roles, responsibilities, and escalation procedures.

4. ENCRYPTION
All confidential data must be encrypted both in transit and at rest using AES-256 encryption standards.

5. COMPLIANCE
This policy ensures compliance with SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001, and GDPR requirements.

criteria.description: Document must specify strong authentication requirements including multi-factor authentication
Document must include data classification scheme and encryption requirements
Document must define incident response procedures with clear timelines
Document must reference relevant compliance standards (SOC 2, ISO 27001, GDPR)

document_text:
Privacy Notice

We collect personal information to provide our services. Information collected includes:
- Name and contact details
- Payment information
- Usage data and preferences

We use this information to:
- Deliver requested services
- Process payments
- Improve our offerings

We may share information with third-party service providers who assist in service delivery.

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information by contacting our support team.

criteria.description: Document must clearly list what personal data is collected
Document must specify legitimate purposes for data use
Document must disclose any sharing with third parties
Document must explain individual rights regarding personal data
Document must provide contact details for privacy inquiries

document_text:
Q4 2024 Financial Report

REVENUE
Total revenue for Q4 2024: $5.2M (up 15% from Q3)
Recurring revenue: $4.1M (79% of total)
One-time revenue: $1.1M

EXPENSES
Operating expenses: $3.8M
- Personnel: $2.3M
- Infrastructure: $0.8M
- Marketing: $0.4M
- Other: $0.3M

PROFITABILITY
Gross profit: $1.4M
Net profit: $0.9M
Profit margin: 17.3%

CASH FLOW
Operating cash flow: $1.2M
Free cash flow: $0.8M
Cash balance: $2.5M

OUTLOOK
Projected Q1 2025 revenue: $5.5M based on current pipeline and seasonal trends.

criteria.description: Document must provide detailed revenue breakdown and growth metrics
Document must categorize expenses by type with specific amounts
Document must include profit margins and profitability calculations
Document must report cash flow from operations and free cash flow
Document should include future projections or outlook statements

document_text:
API Documentation - User Management Service

Endpoint: POST /api/users
Description: Create a new user account

Request Body:
{
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "password": "string",
  "firstName": "string",
  "lastName": "string"
}

Response: 201 Created
{
  "userId": "uuid",
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "firstName": "string",
  "lastName": "string",
  "createdAt": "timestamp"
}

Error Responses:
400 Bad Request - Invalid input data
409 Conflict - Email already exists
500 Internal Server Error - Server error

Authentication: Requires valid API key in header
Rate Limiting: 100 requests per minute per API key

criteria.description: Document must clearly define API endpoints with HTTP methods
Document must specify request body format and required fields
Document must define response structure for success cases
Document must list possible error codes and scenarios
Document must specify authentication and authorization requirements
Document should include rate limiting information

document_text:
Employee Safety Training Manual

CHAPTER 1: WORKPLACE SAFETY BASICS
All employees must complete safety orientation within first week of employment.

CHAPTER 2: EMERGENCY PROCEDURES
Fire evacuation routes are posted throughout the facility. Assembly point is the parking lot south of building.

CHAPTER 3: PERSONAL PROTECTIVE EQUIPMENT
Safety glasses required in laboratory areas. Hard hats required in warehouse zones.

CHAPTER 4: INCIDENT REPORTING
All workplace incidents must be reported to HR within 24 hours using Form SF-101.

CHAPTER 5: TRAINING REQUIREMENTS
Annual safety refresher training required for all employees. Additional role-specific training for high-risk positions.

criteria.description: Document must specify required safety training for all employees
Document must include clear emergency evacuation procedures
Document must specify required personal protective equipment by area
Document must define incident reporting process with timelines
Document must address continuing education and refresher training

document_text:
Project Proposal: Customer Analytics Platform

OBJECTIVE
Develop a comprehensive analytics platform to track customer behavior and improve retention rates.

SCOPE
The platform will include:
- Real-time dashboard
- Customer segmentation tools
- Predictive analytics
- Integration with existing CRM

TIMELINE
Phase 1: Requirements gathering (4 weeks)
Phase 2: Design and architecture (6 weeks)
Phase 3: Development (12 weeks)
Phase 4: Testing and deployment (4 weeks)
Total duration: 26 weeks

RESOURCES
Team: 3 developers, 1 data scientist, 1 UX designer
Budget: $450,000

RISKS
Data integration complexity may cause delays
Third-party API dependencies
User adoption challenges

criteria.description: Document must state specific, measurable project objectives
Document must clearly define project scope and deliverables
Document must include detailed timeline with phases and milestones
Document must specify required team members and budget
Document must identify potential risks and challenges

document_text:
Data Backup Policy

All critical business data should be backed up regularly. Backups must be stored securely.

Contact IT department for assistance with backup procedures.

criteria.description: Document must specify how often backups should be performed
Document must define what data should be backed up
Document must specify backup storage location and security requirements
Document must include data recovery and restoration procedures
Document must address backup testing and validation processes
Document must specify how long backups should be retained

document_text:
Service Agreement - Cloud Hosting Provider

PARTIES
Client: TechCorp Inc.
Provider: CloudHost Solutions LLC

SERVICE DESCRIPTION
Provider will deliver cloud infrastructure services including:
- Virtual machine instances
- Storage solutions
- Network connectivity
- 24/7 technical support

SERVICE LEVEL AGREEMENT
Uptime guarantee: 99.9%
Response time for critical issues: 15 minutes
Resolution time for critical issues: 4 hours

TERM AND TERMINATION
Contract term: 3 years
Termination: 90 days written notice required

PRICING
Monthly fee: $12,000
Overage charges: $0.15 per GB
Setup fee: $2,500 (one-time)

LIABILITY
Provider liability limited to monthly service fees paid in preceding 12 months.

criteria.description: Contract must clearly define services to be provided
Contract must include specific service level commitments with metrics
Contract must specify all fees, charges, and payment terms
Contract must state term length and termination conditions
Contract must address liability and limitation of damages

document_text:
Quick Start Guide - Project Management Tool

GETTING STARTED
1. Log in with your company credentials
2. Click 'New Project' to create your first project
3. Add team members by clicking 'Invite Users'

CREATING TASKS
- Click '+' button to add new tasks
- Set due dates and assign to team members
- Use tags to categorize tasks

TRACKING PROGRESS
- View project dashboard for overview
- Use Gantt chart for timeline visualization
- Generate reports from Reports menu

TROUBLESHOoting
If you experience login issues, contact support@company.com or call 1-800-SUPPORT.

document_metadata.title: Project Management Tool Quick Start Guide

criteria.description: Document must provide step-by-step instructions that are easy to follow
Document must cover main features and functionality
Document must be well-organized with clear headings and structure
Document must include troubleshooting tips and support contact information
Document must be appropriate for intended user skill level

document_text:
Research Study: Customer Satisfaction Analysis

ABSTRACT
This study examines factors influencing customer satisfaction across our service portfolio using survey data from 1,250 customers collected between January-March 2025.

METHODOLOGY
We conducted online surveys using a 5-point Likert scale. Response rate was 23%. Statistical analysis performed using SPSS.

FINDINGS
- Overall satisfaction score: 4.2/5.0
- Top satisfaction drivers: response time (r=0.67), solution quality (r=0.61)
- Demographic analysis shows higher satisfaction among enterprise customers
- Service channel preferences vary by customer segment

LIMITATIONS
Sample may not represent entire customer base due to self-selection bias. Survey timing during peak season may have influenced responses.

RECOMMENDATIONS
Focus improvement efforts on response time optimization and solution quality training for support staff.

criteria.description: Document must clearly describe research methods and data collection approach
Document must report adequate sample size and response rates
Document must include appropriate statistical analysis and significance testing
Document must acknowledge study limitations and potential biases
Document must provide specific, actionable recommendations based on findings
